No new coronavirus cases were reported Saturday in Maine because the state lab that processes test samples was closed Friday for the Christmas holiday.

articles.content: An 18th Humboldt County resident has died after testing positive for COVID-19, and an additional 45 cases of the virus have been confirmed since the most recent report on Wednesday. The total number … [+847 chars]
